function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"More than 60% of included papers in cord-19 do not mention COVID-19 related terms","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear understanding of COVID-19 knowledge","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reflection of temperature and RH effects from the botanical filter in the simulation may lead to inaccurate assessment of energy consumption and thermal comfort.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Climate zones variability may impact the effectiveness of the DBAF, leading to varying levels of energy saving potential in different regions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate contaminant concentration measurements at the inlet and outlet of the air cleaner","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quasi-steady state assumption may lead to inaccurate estimation of emission rates, causing potential misinterpretation of data.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglecting the sink effect term in the mass balance equation may result in underestimation of contaminant levels, leading to inadequate mitigation measures.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient data on the effectiveness of botanical air filtration under realistic ventilation conditions","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overestimation of indoor plant air purification capabilities based on chamber studies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High indoor air pollution levels compared to outdoor levels","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on UV inactivation of viral aerosols","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of linear relationship between UV dose and percent survival","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inconsistent impact of RH on bioaerosol particle size","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on the impact of RH on bioaerosol particle size","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of viruses due to aerosolization and sampling","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerosolization and sampling can lead to survival of infectious viruses, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in survival rates of viruses in different suspension media can impact disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data on the effectiveness of UV air disinfection in preventing airborne transmission of viral aerosols such as SARS coronavirus.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertain relationship between relative humidity RH and UV inactivation rate of bacterial aerosols.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unknown UV susceptibility of pathogenic viral aerosols under varying relative humidity RH conditions.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential airborne spread of new pathogens such as SARS coronavirus and influenza virus.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data on UVGI inactivation of viral aerosols.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of UVGI on different airborne microorganisms.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential reactivation of pathogens during air transport after central disinfection.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, and Legionella pneumophila transmission through indoor air.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pathogens transmitted through the air","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variety of pathogens sensitive to UV-C radiation","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of inactivation rate on pathogen type and environment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate knowledge of germicidal irradiation extent in Slovakia","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unrealistic assumptions about the end of the pandemic peak","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased recreational activity during the COVID-19 lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substitution of prohibited indoor activities with outdoor activities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical data on the impact of systemic shifts in urban design on inhabitants","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to green space may lead to unequal recreational opportunities and potential conflicts of interest.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of equal adoption of Strava across cycling and pedestrian communities","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Mitigation of mental health burden under pandemic conditions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in Strava adoption along socio-economic gradients","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of homogenous Strava adoption over the city of Oslo","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of data from low-income and marginal groups during the lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased pedestrian and cycling activities on city trails with >75% tree canopy cover.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intensified recreational activity in urban periphery","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Greater pedestrian activity in green spaces and parks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interrupted weekly rhythm of recreational activity","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in diurnal activity patterns during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Less pronounced shift in weekday vs weekend activity during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in unemployment and flexible work schedules leading to changes in recreational behaviors","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High population density near recreational trail segments","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in cycling activity during lockdown","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparing activity levels during lockdown to baseline may not account for the impact of abnormal weather variations on recreational activity.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for spatial covariates and their impact on recreational activity assessment during lockdown.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
